ygData.subject: Re: PvP Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m assuming you started in Freeport, you poor devil?  My suggestion: avoid Freeport until you think you can survive it. :)  After getting a little tired
ygData.messageBody:
dean_witcraft@... wrote:

> From: dean_witcraft@...
>
> I play Stargazer Erudite Enchanter on Fennin Ro almost exclusively.
> I have a Barbarian Shaman level 5 also on Fennin Ro but he's just sitting there waiting for me to get bored playing my enchanter.
>
> In my frustration with the lack of role-playing on Fennin Ro, I started a bard on the PvP server (my first PvP experience) and ran him up to lvl 4 or 5, but the first couple of times I took him out of the newbie zone I found groups of level 8 dark elves sitting there PKing over and over again without so much as a nod to rp'ing so I gave that up for the time being. Is anyone playing a PvP bard. Is this experience typical?
> Any suggestions on how to stay alive?
>

I'm assuming you started in Freeport, you poor devil? My suggestion: avoid Freeport until you think you can survive it. :) After getting a little tired of Fennin, I started a bard on Zek last week, and so far I've had a great time. I started in Kelethin, and aside from a few evil gnome and halfling pkers (Hello Yoink, Xoink and Verminnard!), things are pretty peaceful. And, the few times I've been attacked, the stupid
casters always open up with root, giving me ample time to get selos started and hightail it out of there.

Lohengrin
-22nd level bard on Fennin Ro
-8th level bard on Rallos Zek
